title: Kalaivaniye Song Lyrics Sindhu Bhairavi
stanzas:
Kalaivaniye
unaithaane alaithaen
uyir theeyai valarthaen
vara vaendum
varam vaendum
thudithaen thozhuthen
palamurai ninaithaen
azhuthaen isai tharum (2)
Kalaivaniye

thuram paadi siriththaai
sirippaale erithaai
madi meedhu marithaen
maru jenmam koduthai
siru viralgalil thalai koathi
madithanil enai valarthaai
isai enum varam varum neram
dhisai solla villai marandhaai

mugam kaatta maruththaai
mugam kaatta maruththaai
mugavariyai maraithaai
nee mun vandhu
poochindhu vizhith thuligal
therikkiradhu thudaithuvidu

Kalaivaniye
unaithaane alaithaen
uyir theeyai valarthaen
vara vaendum
varam vaendum
thudithaen thozhuthen
palamurai ninaithaen
azhuthaen isai tharum
Kalaivaniye

Ullam azhuthadhu
unnai thozhuthadhu
unadhu uyril ivan paadhi

gangai thalaiyinil
mangai idaiyinil
sivanum ivanum oru jaadhi

raman oru vagai
kannan oru vagai
irandum ulagil sama needhi

angae thirumagal
ingae kalaimagal
avalum ivalum sari paadhi

kanneer perugiyathe...
kanneer perugiye
kannil un mugam
azhagiya nilavena midhakkum

uyire.. uyirin uyire
azhagae.. azhagin azhagae
ini azha valuvillai
vizhigalil thuli illai
ini oru pirivillai
thuyar vara vazhiyilla
varuvaai ....
